product_description: From toggles to pushbuttons, rockers to micro switches, APEM develops and produces one of the widest ranges of interfaces dedicated to panels.
PCB switches are ideal for applications with low current. They are also a smart choice when your control panel requires many switches to control the electronics
APEM develops and produces one of the widest ranges of interfaces dedicated to panels.
This selection of APEM products is the must-have to always keep control of your machines, in full safety.
Are you searching for the right joystick to meet the specific requirements of your industry? APEM simplifies the process of finding the perfect joystick control solutions for your applications.

Combining high-quality components with the knowledge of panel technologies along with their applications in various environments enables us in providing you with an industrial remote control or complete dashboard to fit your exact needs.
